TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CollectionAdapters extends System.Object
public ref class CollectionAdapters abstract sealed

summary.span: 能够实现在外接程序与其宿主应用程序之间传递集合。

span.span: Enables collections to be passed between an add-in and its host application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供方法，使集合转换为集合。This class provides methods that enable an collection to be converted to a collection. 跨隔离边界传递集合并将其转换回外接程序，或者主机应用程序可以使用的集合。The collection is passed across the isolation boundary and converted back to an collection that the add-in or the host application can use. 集合中的对象必须可远程处理。Objects in collections must be remotable. 可以将传递的对象类型的详细信息，请参阅[协定、 视图和适配器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6460173-9507-4b87-8c07-d4ee245d715c)。For more information about the object types that you can pass, see [Contracts, Views, and Adapters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6460173-9507-4b87-8c07-d4ee245d715c).

span.span: Add-Ins and Extensibility

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<T> ToIList<T> (System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<T> collection);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!T> ToIList<T>(class System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1<!!T> collection) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToIList(Of T) (collection As IListContract(Of T)) As IList(Of T)
static member ToIList : System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<'T> -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<'T>

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 列表中所含对象的类型。

span.span: The type of objects that are contained in the list.
T must be serializable.
The collection from the other side of the pipeline.

summary.span: 将指定的 集合转换为 集合。

span.span: Converts the specified collection to an collection.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机应用程序或外接程序可以使用返回集合。The host application or add-in can use the returned collection. 集合将会有远程生存期标记集合。The collection will have a lifetime token for the remote collection. 应使用此方法重载时，才的内容是可以被直接传递到外接程序和主机 （而不是必须改编为视图的类型） 的可序列化类型。You should use this method overload only when the contents of the are serializable types that can be passed directly to the add-in and host (rather than types that must be adapted into views). ## Examples 下面的示例所述实现主机端适配器管道段[演练： 将集合传递之间主机和外接程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b532c604-548e-4fab-b11c-377257dd0ee5)。此示例改编自定义`ProcessBooks`方法通过采用集合传递从外接程序并将其转换为集合，然后可以使用主机应用程序。The following example implements a host-side adapter pipeline segment as described [Walkthrough: Passing Collections Between Hosts and Add-Ins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b532c604-548e-4fab-b11c-377257dd0ee5). The example adapts the custom `ProcessBooks` method by taking the collection passed from the add-in and converting it to an collection, which the host application can then use. [!code-csharp[AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter/cs/LibraryManagerViewToContractAddInAdapter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter/vb/LibraryManagerViewToContractAddInAdapter.vb#3)]

typeparam.span: 定义用于传递类型的对象的协定的类型TView跨隔离边界。

span.span: The type that defines the contract for passing objects of type TView across the isolation boundary.

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: 定义列表中各个对象的视图的类型。

span.span: The type that defines the view of the objects in the list.

param.name: collection
param.span: 传递到管线另一端的集合。

span.span: The collection to pass to the other side of the pipeline.

param.name: contractViewAdapter
param.span: 一个将数据从协定中定义的类型改编为视图中的预期类型的转换器。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the contract to the type expected in the view.

param.name: viewContractAdapter
param.span: 一个将数据从视图中定义的类型改编为协定预期的类型的转换器。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the view to the type expected by the contract.

summary.span: 通过使用转换器适配器将指定的 集合转换为 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection by using converter adapters.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载的包含之前可以将它们传递到外接程序或主机 （而不是简单的可序列化类型，可直接传递） 必须进行适配化的类型的集合。Use this method overload for collections that contain types that must be adapted before they can be passed to the add-in or host (rather than simple serializable types that can be passed directly). 主机应用程序或外接程序可以使用返回集合。The host application or add-in can use the returned collection. 它将具有远程生存期标记。It will have a lifetime token for the remote .

T must be serializable.

summary.span: 将指定的 集合转换为 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以跨外接程序与其主机应用程序之间的隔离边界进行封送。The collection can be marshaled across the isolation boundary between the add-in and its host application. 应使用此方法重载时，才的内容集合都可以被直接传递到协定 （而不是必须改编为协定的类型） 的可序列化类型。You should use this method overload only when the contents of the collection are serializable types that can be passed directly to the contract (rather than types that must be adapted into contracts). ## Examples 下面的示例实现定义的外接程序端适配器管道段的类。The following example implements the class that defines an add-in side adapter pipeline segment. 它改编自定义`ProcessBooks`方法通过采用集合从外接程序视图段传递并将其转换为可以跨主机的隔离边界进行封送的集合。It adapts the custom `ProcessBooks` method by taking the collection passed from the add-in view segment and converting it to an collection that can be marshaled across the isolation boundary to the host. [!code-csharp[AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter/cs/LibraryManagerContractToViewHostAdapter.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter/vb/LibraryManagerContractToViewHostAdapter.vb#4)]

span.span: The type that defines the contract for passing objects of type TView across the isolation boundary.
The collection to convert.

param.name: viewContractAdapter
param.span: 一个将数据从视图中定义的类型改编为协定预期的类型的转换器。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the view to the type expected by the contract.

param.span: 一个将数据从协定中定义的类型改编为视图中的预期类型的转换器。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the contract to the type expected in the view.

summary.span: 通过使用转换器适配器将指定的 集合转换为 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection by using converter adapters.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载的包含之前可以将它们传递到协定 （而不是简单的可序列化类型，可直接传递） 必须适合协定的类型的集合。Use this method overload for collections that contain types that must be adapted into contracts before they can be passed to the contract (rather than simple serializable types that can be passed directly). 集合可以跨外接程序与其主机应用程序之间的隔离边界进行封送。The collection can be marshaled across the isolation boundary between an add-in and its host application.
